  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Adapter
    The class allows it to be visible for the user to pick and choose The user gets to pick an image for their register The class contains some motivation from a tutorial found here
    AdapterController
    Controller class for Adapter model class The controller class for Adapter to get notified of the user's behaviour and update the model class as needed
    AvatarPicker
    Profile avatar picker We have several avatars saved and user is given flexibility to chose the avatars
    BinomialTrial
    First of the 4 trial classes Allows user to perform a binomial trial with boolean outcomes Inherits Trial class that controls all the information of specific trials regardless of its kind
    BinomialTrialDialogFragment
    Maintain consistency in the app 4 types of trials have been broken down into their model classes and fragment classes to maintain consistency and so that the app can follow everything being clicked on the screen that affects it Essentially to create and host dialog per trial
    ByteArrayDataSource
    Datasource backed by a byte array which could be passed directly or could be initialized if need be Getter/setter/constructor for the class
    CountTrial
    Second of the 4 trial classes Allows user to perform a count trial and store the outcome as an integer Inherits Trial class that controls all the information of specific trials regardless of its kind
    CountTrialDialogFragment
    Maintain consistency in the app 4 types of trials have been broken down into their model classes and fragment classes to maintain consistency and so that the app can follow everything being clicked on the screen that affects it Essentially to create and host dialog per trial
    CreateExperimentActivity
    Experiment activity in the app Experiments are shown on the app where the owner can create experiment for the users
    EditProfileFragment
    Edit profile fragment class Fragment class for the user/owner to edit profile once the profile has been created
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    Experiment
    Specificity per experiment It gives all the possible details an Experiment possess like owner of that Experiment, title etc for the owner to set as per their needs
    ExperimentAdapter
    Shows the experiment in the main UI of the app
    ExperimentViewActivity
    Helps in viewing the experiment details on the app
    FireStoreController
    Database connection to the app It controls the inflow and outflow of the data and stores that in the remote server Firestore Some motivation was taken from youtube tutorials on Firestore
    GlobalVariable
    Global variables for the app to use when need be
    GMailSender
    GMail connection to the app Connects to the main GMail domain when the new user signs up for the app
    JSSEProvider
    Maintains secure internet communication for the app to run smoothly
    LogInActivity
    Login activity in the app Login is the first thing the user sees despite them being a user or an owner It provides login interface, registration button, login button etc
    MapsActivity  
    MeasurementTrial
    Third of the 4 trial classes Allows user to perform a measurement trial or repeated measurements and record a decimal value of the recorded Inherits Trial class that controls all the information of specific trials regardless of its kind
    MeaurementTrialFragment
    Maintain consistency in the app 4 types of trials have been broken down into their model classes and fragment classes to maintain consistency and so that the app can follow everything being clicked on the screen that affects it Essentially to create and host dialog per trial
    MenuController
    Controls the menu of the app and stores the input of the user
    MyExperimentAdapter
    The current logged in user's experiment information is stored for the app to access
    MyExperimentsActivity
    The current logged in user sees his experiments for the app to store
    MySubscriptionActivity
    Shows all the experiments the logged in user is currently subscribed to
    NonnegativeTrial
    Last of the 4 trial classes Allows user to perform a nonnegative trial which outputs a count in a nonnegative interger format Inherits Trial class that controls all the information of specific trials regardless of its kind
    NonNegativeTrialActivity  
    NonnegativeTrialFragment
    Maintain consistency in the app 4 types of trials have been broken down into their model classes and fragment classes to maintain consistency and so that the app can follow everything being clicked on the screen that affects it Essentially to create and host dialog per trial
    Profile
    User profile This has all the neccessary requirements of any profile
    ProfileActivity
    Profile activity in the app Profile is unique per user with different parameters Currently logged in user/owner would see things differently
    ProfileController
    Controller class for Profile model class The controller class for Profile to get notified of the user's behaviour and update the model class as needed
    QuestionsActivity  
    RegisterActivity
    Register for the app and how the user sees it on the app
    Reseter
    When the user wants to reset their login details
    SearchController
    Search in the app is controlled by this class The controller class for Adapter to get notified of the user's behaviour and update the model class as needed
    SearchExperimentActivity
    This handles when a user wants to search a specific experiment with keyword
    SearchUserActivity
    This handles when a user wants to search a specific user with keyword
    SplashScreen
    Splash screen for the app The constant screen that is played for a fixed amount of time when the app is opened
    statsActivity
    This class displays all the stats of the experiments on the app screen for the user to see The class contains some reference from The class contains some reference from
    statsactivity_checking  
    testCreateExperiment  
    testSearch  
    Trial
    Extends trial
    TrialActivity
    Trial activity in the app 4 types of trial extend this class to get themselves visible on the app
    TrialsAdapter
    Adapter class for Trial method class This makes the trial visible on the app for the user/owner to choose/pick
    UserAdapter
    User visible on the app Adapter class for user to opt their desired parameters
